title: Low FPS regardless of settings
body:
I've been playing on april fools 2017- and it wall all as usual +/- 120 to 73 FPS. On 2017-04-02 however my FPS droped to 46 at start of the game to 13 FPs during 3v3 fights. I didin't download anything I tryed setting to very low graphics but nothing helped, FPS didin't increase. I tryed many things but I couldn't fix it so i'm out of options please give me some advice.

{{item:3070}} {{item:2050}}

replies.body:
I'm glad to see you found the repair option on the client! That can help in most situations if your game is acting weird, but since this is an FPS issue you may need to check a few others things like your graphics driver and other programs that might be running in the background. Check out this [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)) as well.

Hit me back up if you're still having problems!
